campaign_brief.sample_headlines: Your Vision, Our Priority: Exclusive Offers for Our Valued Customers.
campaign_brief.value_propositions: Show appreciation for loyalty with exclusive discounts, early access to new styles, and personalized eye care reminders to ensure optimal vision health.
